function.description: Joins the elements of `list`. Returns the result as one string.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The list that will be made into one string.
The delimiter that will be used to seperate the items (default is "").

function.longDescription: If `list` only contains one string, `join` returns that string. If an element contains an OBJECT, its string representation is used.
